title: feat: use json-path to select from tracing data for evals

body: > [!IMPORTANT] > Add JSON path selection for tracing data in evaluation configurations using `jsonpath-plus`. > > - **Behavior**: > - Add `jsonSelector` to `variableMapping` and `wipVariableMapping` in `types.ts` for JSON path selection. > - Update `EvaluatorForm` and `InnerEvalConfigForm` in `evaluator-form.tsx` to include JSON selector input when applicable. > - Use `jsonpath-plus` in `evalService.ts` to parse JSON paths in `parseDatabaseRowToString()`. > - **Dependencies**: > - Add `jsonpath-plus` version `10.0.7` to `package.json`. > - **Functions**: > - Add `fieldHasJsonSelectorOption()` in `evaluator-form.tsx` to determine JSON selector applicability. > - Modify `extractVariablesFromTracingData()` in `evalService.ts` to use JSON path selection. > > This description was created by [](https://www.ellipsis.dev?ref=langfuse%2Flangfuse&utm_source=github&utm_medium=referral) for 2e8b3b0db017725fc6b6dd97dc9cf7c67e6e4409. It will automatically update as commits are pushed.
